        Trainer trainer The trainer ready to fight

        The Trainer which is about to be attacked

        Trainer trainer The trainer which is about to be attacked

      • attack

        public int attack​(Capacity capacity)
        Active team attack non active team with the capacity given in parameter
        Parameters:
        Capacity - capacity Capacity used to attack
        Returns:
        Damages done
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the fight already ended
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if capacity is null

      • giveUp

        public void giveUp()
        Active team give up
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the fight already ended

      • getTurn

        public FightTurn getTurn()
        Return the state of the fight
        Returns:
        FightTurn.user : user plays, FightTurn.ennemy : computer plays, FightTurn.userVictory : user wins or FightTurn.ennemyVictory : user lost

      • changeAttacker

        public void changeAttacker​(Pokemon pokemon)
        Change the active attacker
        Parameters:
        Pokemon - pokemon Pokemon which replace active pokemon
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the fight already ended
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if pokemon is null
